001package reversi;
002
003import java.util.ArrayList;
004import java.util.List;
005
006public class Grid extends Object {
007    private Piece piece;
008    private Boolean endGrid;
009    private Integer index;
010    private Boolean placePiece;
011    private List<Grid> nextGrids;
012    private Integer column;
013    private Integer row;
014
015    public Grid(Piece aPiece,Integer aInteger) {
016        piece = aPiece;
017        aPiece.increment();
018        endGrid = false;
019        index = aInteger;
020        placePiece = true;
021        nextGrids = new ArrayList<>();
022        return;
023    }
024
025    public Grid(Piece aPiece) {
026        piece = aPiece;
027        placePiece = false;
028        return;
029    }
030
031    public void initialize(Integer maxColumn) {
032        row = index / maxColumn;
033        column = index - (row * maxColumn);
034        return;
035    }
036
037    public void setNextGrids(List<Grid> aSetNextGrids) {
038        nextGrids = aSetNextGrids;
039        return;
040    }
041
042    public void setPiece(Piece aPiece) {
043        piece.decrement();
044        piece = aPiece;
045        piece.increment();
046        placePiece = false;
047        return;
048    }
049
050    public void setEndGrid(Boolean aBoolean) {
051        endGrid = aBoolean;
052        return;
053    }
054
055    public Boolean isEndGrid() {
056        return endGrid;
057    }
058
059    public Boolean isPlacePiece(){
060        return placePiece;
061    }
062
063    public Piece getPiece() {
064        return piece;
065    }
066
067    public Integer getColor() {
068        return piece.getColor();
069    }
070
071    public Integer getColumn() {
072        return column;
073    }
074
075    public Integer getRow() {
076        return row;
077    }
078
079    public List<Grid> getNextGrids(){
080        return nextGrids;
081    }
082
083    public Grid getNextGrid(Integer index){
084        return nextGrids.get(index);
085    }
086
087    public Integer getNextGridIndex(Grid aGrid){
088        return nextGrids.indexOf(aGrid);
089    }
090
091    public void setPlacePiece(Boolean aBoolean){
092        placePiece = aBoolean;
093        return;
094    }
095}
